page.title: 13HEMPSTEAD FOREST.
page.content: THERE ARE{134}HECTARES OF TREES WHICH ARE DIVIDED INTO 2 PARTS.{117}ARE CONIFERS AND{17}ARE DECIDUOUS. MOST OF THE TREES ARE USED FOR BUILDING, FENCES, WOOD PULP & PIT-PROPS. THE FOREST COVERS 166 HECTARES. THE FOREST GROWS 4 AND A HALF TONS A DAY. THERE HAVE BEEN{3 SERIOUS FOREST FIRES.}THE TREES HAVE 2 MAIN DISEASES-FUNGUS AND BUTT-ROT.THE FORESTRY COMMISSION DON'T OWN THE LAND,BUT HAVE A 250 YEAR LEASE ON IT. IT WAS BOUGHT IN 1941.THE TREES WERE PLANTED IN{1947-1956.}THE ANIMALS IN THE FOREST ARE MICE, RABBITS, SQUIRRELS,DEER,FOXES ETC. IN HIS SPARE TIME THE HEAD FORESTER ENJOYS FISHING,SHOOTING AND GOING OUT WITH HIS 2 DOGS. IN THE FOREST IS A LARGE POND, BUILT IN THE LAST CENTURY AS A {DUCK DECOY.}A LARGE HERD OF RED DEER HAS BUILT UP IN THE FOREST OVER THE LAST FEW YEARS.
